short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insert your saved phone number into text fields with a click or right-click menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Phone Number Inserter is a simple and convenient tool that allows you to quickly insert your saved phone number into any text input field. Whether you're filling out online forms, sending messages, or completing registrations, this extension saves you time by automatically inserting your pre-saved phone number.

Key Features:

Right-Click Insertion: Use the context menu (right-click) on any text field to instantly insert your phone number.
Customizable Phone Number: Easily set or update your phone number via the extension's settings page.
Keyboard-Free Convenience: No more typing! Just right-click or click on the extension to insert your number.
Works Across Websites: Compatible with any website or form that has standard or editable input fields.
Privacy-Focused: Your phone number is stored locally in your browser and is never shared.
How to Use:

1. Install the extension and go to the settings page to save your phone number.
2. Right-click on any text field and select "Insert Phone Number" from the menu, or use the popup button.
3. Watch your phone number appear instantly in the field!
